text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) thæcring chan xyu bn hlakthan xan chadcen cak phracea khxng chan nı khna deiywkan phwk cea k ptiseth hlakthan nan thi channan mimi sing thi phwk cea rengrib kan dxk thæcring kar chikhad nan michı siththi khxng khır xun nxkcak pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ theanan doythi phraxngkh ca thrng cæng khwam cring læa phraxngkh pen phu thi yeiym thisud nı brrda phu chikhad
